type.name: org.gradle.platform.base.Platform
type.description:
The platform or runtime that a binary is designed to run on.
Examples: the JvmPlatform defines a java runtime, while the NativePlatform defines the Operating System and Architecture for a native app.

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: Returns a human consumable name for this platform.

property.name: displayName
property.description: Returns a human consumable name for this platform.
